data.actual_result: Message box is stuck under the keyboard, messages are not visible and the keyboard must be hidden before you can send.
data.expected_result: Message box should slide up above the keyboard to remain visible while the keyboard is shown (similar to split view)
data.short_description: Unlike split view, the message box does not slide up to become visible when Discord is in Slide-Over popup
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord above an app in Slide-Over mode - Press the message box.
